/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the road, hinting at the city's dynamic pace of life. The sky above is a hazy orange color, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon setting. In the background, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its architectural diversity and the constant movement of its streets.
